Dear paulderby, the running time probably differs due to the PAL download running faster than film or NTSC standard at 25 fps instead of 24fps. This would account for the 4 minutes as nothing appears to be missing.

Currently digital videos lack sync stability so try another player. VLC usually corrects them. Sometimes it can be due to a codec, Downloading again will do if there was data loss in the transfer. I don't know the options Convert-X offers but if your DVD player doesn't support H-264 you will need to convert to MPEG that also applies to burning onto CD-R.
